nodes.text: A Mon Alone was an adventure for the Living Force roleplaying campaign. It was written by Morrie Mullins.

The adventure included a critical event summary that could be sent to the RPGA before September 30, 2004 after being delayed from june 17, 2004 . The summary was to include the final fate of several characters. Following the Living Force politics, the most popular answers would become canon. For example, if 50% of the returned event summaries included "Phylus Mon escaped," then Phylus Mon would be considered at large for further supplements.

This two-round adventure was considerably longer than other Living Force adventures. It proposed the use of soundtracks from The Phantom Menace during the first round and Attack of the Clones during the second round as background music.
